global.name: Invoicing
global.description: Efficiently Create and Send professional business invoices, track payment statuses, establish due dates, apply reverse charge as necessary, and access a range of additional functionalities to streamline financial management and enhance business operations.

global.name: Unlimited user access
global.description: Grant unlimited user access with customizable roles, to enhanced security and also allowing you to set restrictions based on  Date range, CIDR ranges.

global.name: IP Security
global.description: Implementing IP security in Giddh ensures restricted access to authorized IP addresses, and protecting sensitive financial data. It ensures compliance, reduces the risk of breaches, and enhances overall control and monitoring of system access for better security.

global.name: Inventory Management
global.description: Maintain inventory of Product, and Services in group, items and variant too, easy search with barcode, real-time inventory reports.

global.name: Multi-currency
global.description: Manage invoicing and payments seamlessly across 100+ currencies, with automatic currency conversion based on real-time exchange rates.

global.name: Invoice on whatsapp, Email, and SMS
global.description: You can efficiently send invoices through various channels like WhatsApp, email, and SMS directly from your accounting software.

global.name: Journal Entries
global.description: GIDDH offers a Ledger-Based Journal Entry feature, allowing users to directly input entries into the company's ledger (Accounts). This feature provides real-time updates on account balances, eliminating the need to navigate to separate pages for checking balances after posting entries.

global.name: Bank reconciliation
global.description: Connect your bank account in Giddh, and with just one click, we will compare and match the transactions of your books with your bank account.

global.name: Shopify Integration
global.description: Provides Shopify Integration with Giddh that streamlines sales data, automates order and payment sync for accurate financial records. It offers real-time insights into revenue, inventory, and customer data, enhancing efficiency and enabling informed decision-making for business growth.

global.name: Barcode
global.description: The barcode feature in Giddh simplifies inventory management. By scanning a product's barcode, all its details seamlessly populate in invoices and purchase bills.

global.name: Audit Trail
global.description: An audit trail in Giddh, logs all transactions, enabling a detailed record of changes, enhancing accountability, and facilitating error detection for regulatory compliance and transparency.

global.name: Date range security
global.description: Giddh's date range security feature enables setting user-specific date restrictions, ensuring confidential data access only within defined periods. This controls financial data access, maintaining privacy and limiting unauthorized entry to sensitive information.

global.name: Multiple Reports
global.description:
We provides various types of reports, like
  1. Trial balance
  2. Profit & loss
  3. Balance sheet
  4. Daybook
  5. Aging report

global.name: Fixed Asset Management
global.description: Giddh's Fixed Asset Management streamlines the oversight and control of fixed assets, allowing for categorization into Groups, Stock, and variants. This feature offers real-time reports, enabling efficient monitoring and strategic asset management for your business.

global.name: Branch and warehouse management
global.description: Efficiently manage the company's numerous branches and warehouses, access branch- and warehouse-specific reports, facilitate branch transfers, archive the branch and warehouse and perform various related tasks.

in.name: Invoice
in.description: Easily generate and send GST invoices, set due dates, and apply reverse charges.

in.name: Unlimited user access
in.description: As a cloud accounting software, we offer unlimited free user access across all plans, ensuring flexibility and inclusivity for all users.

in.name: IP Security
in.description: Restrict user access to specific locations such as your office or home through IP security measures. Our cloud accounting ensures security akin to offline software.

in.name: GST Compliances
in.description: Create GST invoices, view GST reports, direct filing, E-invoice generation , and reconcile transactions with the GST portal.

in.name: Inventory Management
in.description: Efficiently manage stock and variants while also supporting customer-specific pricing and discount management.

in.name: Multi-currency
in.description: Manage invoicing and payments seamlessly across 100+ currencies, with automatic currency conversion based on real-time exchange rates.

in.description: An audit trail in Giddh, logs all transactions, enabling a detailed record of changes, enhancing accountability, and facilitating error detection for regulatory compliance and transparency.

  3. Balance sheet
  4. GST reports
  5. Daybook
  6. Aging report

in.name: Fixed Asset Management
in.description: Giddh's Fixed Asset Management streamlines the oversight and control of fixed assets, allowing for categorization into Groups, Stock, and variants. This feature offers real-time reports, enabling efficient monitoring and strategic asset management for your business.

in.name: Branch and warehouse management
in.description: Efficiently manage the company's numerous branches and warehouses, access branch- and warehouse-specific reports, facilitate branch transfers, archive the branch and warehouse and perform various related tasks.
